name: kraut
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] short for sauerkraut: cabbage that has been cut into small pieces and preserved in salt: I love to mix green and red cabbage to end up with bright pink kraut. How long do you leave the kraut in the boiling water?
[ C ] old-fashioned offensive (also Kraut) an extremely offensive word for a person from Germany
More examplesFewer examplesMy mother has made kraut this way for almost 50 years.Try the sauerkraut juice that will be left in the bowl after the kraut is eaten.The kraut usually will stay snow white and not turn soft if done this way.
